text: so um for the cooking assignments they
had to reproduce something that we had
cooked in the previous class and um well
since for every class we were cooking a
variety of dishes then it was up to them
to decide whether they wanted to cook
for example risotto with mushroom or
risoto with zafferano with saffron or
risoto with zucchini I let them that I
left them to make the choice but then
the idea was to repeat the dish that we
had done on the Thursday before because
um it's very difficult if you cook in a
group and if there is somebody
supervising and then when you are on
your own maybe you realize oh that step
is not so clear and it reinforces what
they have been learning the same I mean
the idea of the kitchen assignment is
the same idea um behind a written
assignment a grammar assignment you want
to reinforce what has been learned
before
